DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect Remote Ischemic Preconditioning cognitive function patient undergoing cardiac surgery compare control intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Cognitive Function After Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo heart surgery cardiopulmonary bypass Emergency case Myocardial infarction 7 day prior enrollment Stroke 2 month prior enrollment Ejection fraction le 30 % Previous psychiatric neurological illness Inability give inform consent
